website_summaries.verdict: This formula tackles three common issues by avoiding many common food allergies, providing a recipe for sensitive dogs, and promoting future digestive health with probiotics.
pros: Rice, lamb, and barley recipe is easy on sensitive skin and stomachs
Features omega-6 fatty acids and zinc for healthier skin
cons: Some dogs tire of the flavor after a while

website_summaries.verdict: Awesome choice for picky eaters who will come running for the soft pieces of real lamb, and you’ll appreciate the key nutrients and quality ingredients they’re happily wolfing down.
pros: Crunchy kibble and meaty chunks combo

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food but it was delivered weird
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this dog food. Today Amazon decided not to box this item. I don’t know why. But the UPS tags were on the outside of the dog food bag. I am just happy it wasn’t busted open or anything. Not liking it wasn’t in a box to be delivered or maybe it was and the box broke open. I have no clue. I just thought it was weird how it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Made my Vizsla sick.  Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Made my dog sick. Have tried quite a few types of food just to "mix it up" for my fur child, not having to eat the same thing his whole life... He started throwing up randomly, figured it could be any number of things based on possibilities where I live. Process of elimination revealed the dog food was at fault. Had heard myths about "bad batches" of dog food, but never experienced it in 33 years of dog ownership. Hopefully this will be the first and only time - won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy

customer_reviews.title: Finicky Dog
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the shredded dog food by mistake. 2 of my dogs love it and my 3rd dog picks thru the different flavored nuggets and leaves a big mess of the ones she doesn't like all over the floor. So overall it runs about the same price as local businesses that sell it , but with the luxury of having it delivered right to my door . I may have to go back to the Purina Salmon Dog Food for Sensitive Skin and Stomachs because they are all the same nugget flavors and none is left all over the floor. Either one is excellent dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Best food Ive tried
customer_reviews.text: My great Dane has been on every "top" food from Blue Buffalo to Fromm to everything in between. I've tried dozens over the years and she has always been a very finicky eater, nothing I've tried has ever seemed to work so I just assumed she was "one of those dogs". I finally switched to the Pro Plan Savor beef and rice formula 5 months ago and what a difference it has been!! She will now eat her food with coaxing and and absolutely loves it to death! Her coat has become so shiny and she has put on 20lbs with this food. I honestly couldn't be happier with the results and my girl looks so healthy and beautiful now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if that is a great review since MY dog loves all food, but he isn't hesitant about this one, and the kibble is larger so he can actually chew it rather than gobble and swallow. I will often use one chunk as a reward. Read that vets agree grain free causes heart problems, so changed BACK to this one. He's a giant breed and needs all the help he can get to make it past 10 years. He is regular, loves the food, and seems to help his dry skin a bit. Won't change again unless the formula does.
customer_reviews.author: C. FryTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It was an easy switch. It's been 6 months and he still ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this food. I was in a bind and had run out of an old brand, had to do a quick switch so I was worried he would get diarrhea bUT he didnt! And he is a German Shepherd with sensitive stomach! It was an easy switch. It's been 6 months and he still loves it. I like the real chunks of meat in it. it is a high quality food for a very decent price. I researched ALOT before getting this food and the quality is very good. He is a working police dog and he still has a beautiful coat and good muscle tone on this food.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Looks more like chunks  of shredded meat than little round or triangular nuggets of hard dry food
customer_reviews.text: My dog thinks this is a treat. She loves it so much and she's really picky. This is the only dog food she'll eat regularly. Even my grand dogs who come over alot immediately go to her food bowl and eat it all up if there is any left over. Snuffy loves to share with her doggie cousins. I recommend this to anyone who has a problem eater.
customer_reviews.author: bonemama55

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't use any other brand!
customer_reviews.text: We have always feed out dogs Purina - and both our English Setters lived to 15+ years. Our vet and trainer have recommended this brand of Purina for our new English setter who has trouble keeping her weight up from being so active. She loves it and we LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: birdsley

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT bode well for my dog! Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My previous food was discontinued by the manufacturer and my dog was losing interest in it, so it was time for us to change her food. While my 20 pound Dachshund mix loved the flavor of this food (and is chronically a picky eater), we noticed that her stool changed color and texture for the worse while gradually integrating this into her diet. Eventually (after about 3 weeks), this culminated in several episodes of diarrhea that have been chronic even after discontinuing this food. I am still working with my vet to determine the plan going forward, but I am certain that this food contributed to my dog’s symptoms and digestive decline.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Gobbled up by a picky eater
customer_reviews.text: After months of mixing wet and dry food for my pup and her still not eating consistently was ready to try a new food for her. We visited her pup cousins and she ate all their food (2 plate fulls!) So I immediately order a small bag and thought about “slowly” transitioning her from her old kibble to this kibble but she would just eat around the other food! So I swapped out the plates and GONE in 5 minutes. A true testament. I’m so glad I stumbled on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What can I say about a tasty food that I do not eat!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about a tasty food that I do not eat! All I know is my Aussie Velcro loves the stuff. He eagerly awaits my filling his dish. And it's gone! He hasn't complained once. Wet or dry he eats it up. I've tried. Or he's tried 2 flavors. The salmon one and the beef one. I think he likes the salmon one, more.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Who

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.....And Koda likes it!
customer_reviews.text: We usually buy our dog food from Costco but I’m in no mood to risk going there for dog food. So this seemed the next best way. I was worried about quality and condition but it arrived intact and my dog likes it a lot. He’s not a picky guy in general, but I can tell he likes this one. It has these irregular shapes that “resemble” torn chicken and maybe it’s just my imagination but it looks so much more tasty and enjoyable for him. I’m really happy with it and the price was very good!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! Expired dog food received in August 2020 with expiration of November 2019.
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! Expired dog food received in August 2020 with expiration of November 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Grey

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My four rescued mixed breed pups have been eating Purina Pro Plan for the past four years. We started with the chicken formula to improve their health and clear up skin issues with the two dogs who came from the shelter. A year or so later we switched to the beef formula because my oldest dog had skin allergies, which I learned could likely be caused by the chicken. Purina Pro Plan Beef formula hasn't let us down yet. No more skin/itching issues! We stand by this brand, my dogs love it and it's good for them. I'm so glad Amazon offers this food for a fair price. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Bee

customer_reviews.title: Dogs seem to go crazy for it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help keep my dogs' (Boxers) coats shiny and smooth, and they both go absolutely crazy when its time to dump food in their bowls, much more so than the Large Breed, Lamb/Rice, Chicken/Rice or any other Pro Plan flavor I've tried. Its probably stupid, but I also like that the food looks like chunks of food, rather than the little tidbits that are all the same size. Give this one a whirl if you're looking to introduce some variety into your doggie's diet.
customer_reviews.author: MelanieL

customer_reviews.title: Gives my dog stomach problems
customer_reviews.text: Gave my dog diarrhea. Not only that, but my dog looked as if he had blood in his stool, so it has to be really irritating his stomach. I know it is the food because I stopped giving this to my dog and his stool returned to normal, but after feeding it to him again, the diarrhea started back up.
customer_reviews.author: R.King

customer_reviews.title: Irregular size of the pieces
customer_reviews.text: I have fed this product to my 2 dogs (Shiatsu and Australian Sheppard/Boarder Collie mix) for many years. The irregular size of the pieces has always been an issue. Sometimes the pieces are small and sometimes they are big. I have to mix the pieces with wet food. I also break up the pieces so my 15 year old Shiatsu could eat them. They both eat this food well and their annual medical exam shows that they are very healthy according to my vet. I just don't understand why the size of the pieces can be consistent in their sized, preferably a little smaller. FYI, the larger bag has lot more crumbs.
customer_reviews.author: JohnMay

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: When I recently got an Okd English Sheepdog puppy the breeder was feeding Purina Proplan puppy food. Martha loved this and as I did research on grain-free foods I learned a great deal about cardiomyopathy and the many dogs who had died from eating a grain-free diet and FYI v from cardiomyopathy. Martha is now 1 year old and she as well as my two Pugs Ollie and Naeve eat Purina Proplan Savor shredded beef. Their coats are beautiful and their poop is perfect. I highly recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Dog with food allergy loves it
customer_reviews.text: We have tried a large variety of food brands, including very very expensive alternatives. This one wins. Was recommended by our friend who is a vet tech. These dogs love the food and do not seem to have the allergic reaction to it as they have others. And we like the savings involved in this over some of the others we have tried. We want what is best for our dogs but also do not want to break the bank. Great option.
customer_reviews.author: PBaker

customer_reviews.title: So good our dog licks his bowl clean to get every little bit!
customer_reviews.text: We chose the shredded beef with probiotic because we wanted to help our dogs with their digestive system and let me say that it REALLY works. They love their food and it helps them digest it super well too! Our dogs always get super excited for their meals! One of our dogs had a hard time with having an appetite but after switching to this he eats everything and even licks the bowl clean!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kim

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the bag for a large dog. I like the fact that it contains probiotics and omegas. My little dogs love it too. The kibbles are not huge nor are they very hard because two of my little dogs are senior and they eat it just fine (l mix with their food). I am on my second bag. I love the next day delivery. I have lugging a 35-lb bag home.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Martin

customer_reviews.title: Worms. Again.
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered on bag. And it turns out it was infested with worms that turned into little black beetles and overtook our pantry for weeks. We keep our food in a vittles vault so it’s well sealed. And they kept multiplying and multiplying. I got a refund because this isn’t the cheapest food. Well, I ordered a new bag and went to check today. And I saw a worm. Again. So I just threw it out. Once? Maybe understandable. Twice? Gross and unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: CamilleElise

customer_reviews.title: My Boyz love this food
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs, one is a picky eater and has stomach issues. This probiotic food solved both problems. He loves it and eats it without complaint! After many other brands/flavor attempts, bingo! My other pup Mack will eat anything so I am happy that he gobbles it up as expected, but I feel the probiotics keep problems at bay from everything else he eats! IE: Stick bark, plastic garden shoes, any and all materials in his toys etc.
customer_reviews.author: KC Sepia

customer_reviews.title: Taking this off my subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: The one star is for the care in shipping this product rather than the product itself. The bag of dog food arrived today in a battered box that was way too big for the size of the dog food bag. The excess space allowed the dog food bag to be jostled around, resulting in pulverization of food chunks. My dogs are not picky eaters so it'll probably get eaten but I am definitely not having it delivered again.
customer_reviews.author: SnowAngel

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 of bag had some misshppen bits that my dog would not eat.
customer_reviews.text: Weird things in about 1/3 of the bag, looked like popcorn instead of the normal chunks of food. My dog spit them out. I thought this was a problem with just the bag I bought before this one. I don't know if they are just dumping bad bags on amazon or if they are all like this. I don't remember the bag I bought in a local store having this. I'm switching back to Wellness Core, which costs a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Dog LOVES
customer_reviews.text: This food was a great hit, my dog usually eats the Costco Kirkland Lamb but they were out of stock so i ordered this, she's obsessed! Seems very fresh. The only thing to note is that Amazon delivered through USPS who refused to bring this 47lb bag to my house, so I had to go to the post office to pick up during quarantine, defeating the purpose of ordering through Amazon. FYI!
customer_reviews.author: Elicia Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shiny coat on my sensitive stomach beagle mix
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our little rescue who came with multiple gastrointestinal issues. After trying many products, this one is his favorite. He doesn't pick at it and it makes his coat shiny and his breath doesn't smell fishy all the time anymore. This is a subscription now because we like it so much. These big bags a last about 1.5 months for our medium sized beagle.
customer_reviews.author: B Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: THis seems to be the best dog food so far my dog has a lot of allergies and I started her out with a different dog food and she would get sick all the time (and no it wasn't a cheap dog food either). My vet recommended Purina Pro Plan to me and we started with the sensitivity skin and stomach version first. Now every once in a while I'll mix it with the chicken flavor to give her a extra treat and she never gets sick anymore. I recommend this product all of the time!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: They love the lamb shreds!
customer_reviews.text: Both dogs turned their nose up at the Orijen Tundra they have been eating for a year after tasting Purina Pro Plan Savor in lamb with lamb shards and probiotics. There was no break-in period. They jumped into the Pro Plan Savor and that is what they will eat. My happiness is that they no longer fart all day and their poop is firm every day now. This is an excellent choice for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy and high quality food
customer_reviews.text: We have a German shorthair pointer and know between breeders and friends and family with the same, this is the “go to” food for most gsp’s. They have very soft coats, tons of energy, white strong teeth and bones, no itching or hair loss. Food is always eaten in its entirety at feeding time with excitement. Very little waste in healthy excrement unlike less quality foods. Really no other choice out there without spending a good deal more. We have used chicken and beef in both puppy, savor, and sport. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food with bugs
customer_reviews.text: Our dog really likes this brand of dog food, but I won't purchase it through Amazon again. This last bag had worms in it. Meal worms? I'm sure it didn't hurt our dog, but I don't want the bugs in our house. Our dog food bin is sealed very tightly and I had just washed it out, so I'm sure it originated in the bag of food. Probably a warehouse problem. If I purchase it locally, it would be easier to return if it happens again. I've ordered this before through Amazon and never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: VJT

customer_reviews.title: Great for Picky dogs
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t love the poultry by-product meal ingredient. I got this on a list of best dog food for picky eaters. The first one I bought had more natural ingredients. But, still had to sprinkle dog food topper to get my dog to eat it. Tried this and he actually seems to love it, I don’t need to add anything! And actually the only thing left in his food bowl is the old food I poured this on top of.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Trinkner

customer_reviews.title: Best food for large dogs. No allergies
customer_reviews.text: So good for my doggy! No allergies he loves it! Sometimes I mix it with salmon oil so that it’s not so dry and it’s good for his coat and joints. He’s is a German Shepherd. I buy this bag and store it in a plastic container and keeps its fresh and it’s air tight and there are no smells. It’s lasts about a month. I feed him twice a day small portions.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: The Only Food for our Terrier-Mix
customer_reviews.text: Our dog was being fed this dog food by the agency we adopted him from, and we continued using it for his diet. This is a great price for it considering what the pet stores charge. Tucker loves it. His vet is always pleased about his health, his coat is nice and shiny, and he's full of energy.
customer_reviews.author: L. M Young

customer_reviews.title: A great dog food but this bag was super crumbly
customer_reviews.text: Petey loves Purina Pro Plan. We went through a few different foods and he was itchy, scratchy and downright grumpy until we returned to his favorite food. However, this last bag is not the quality I have come to expect from Purina Pro Plan. It has a lot of crumbs throughout the bag and is just messy. Petey doesn't mind but I wonder why this food seems so beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: Shredded bits like Lucky Charms Marshmallows
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. Especially the shredded bits. You'd swear it was the marshmallows in Lucky Charms cereal. They eat those pieces first like candy. Both my elderly and young dog are very healthy with shiny coats eating this food. Great value too. Price competitive with local and other online retailor store prices.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect food for my boys!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 "bagel" dogs have been on Purina Pro since they were puppies and transitioned from purine puppy food to this with ease. They love the food. My vet loves the brand. Good for me. Everyone comments how soft and shiny... just healthy my boys are. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: ScrappyMags

customer_reviews.title: smelled rotten
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this dog food to attempt a higher fat/high calorie food since she is a picky eater and we were trying something new. Smelled almost rancid when initially opening the bag. Would have returned but since it is such a large bag seemed like too much of a hassle. I'm not sure about "high quality" ingredients but something didn't seem right.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good food! But not buying here again
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this! She seems to enjoy the taste, and she was having tummy issues, and it has helped so much. That being said, I will not buy this from Amazon again. This is the second time that our bag has had a hole in it upon arrival and ants have made their way into the bag. Not our preferred dog food addition!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after switching to this food, my dog started getting sick after every meal. We switched back to our original food - purina pro plan focus lamb and rice - and she went right back to normal. Don’t know what could be so different as they’re the same brand, but there was something in this bag her little tummy didn’t like
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Finally something my picky eater likes
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using the Beef and Rice formula for our Lab mix and Lab/Border Collie/Greyhound mix. We have a super picky eater who takes a lot of coaxing to eat, and she’s been eating this mix without complaint or convincing! It seems like the softer beefy bits help.
customer_reviews.author: RGBrie

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it, less shedding.
customer_reviews.text: Our very picky dog is also prone to shedding and stomach issues when she’s on a good that doesn’t agree with her. We’ve tried several very expensive brands and ultimately this mixed 50/50 with the Rachel Ray open range does the trick. No tummy issues, she likes it, shedding has drastically reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Pro Plan Formula Change
customer_reviews.text: Purina Pro Plan Savor has changed their formula. They added probiotics to this particular line. My daughter's guide dog was on it since we got her and now this. She's been having problems with soft stool, diarrhea and gas. Stopped giving this and it cleared up. It's not Amazon. It's the company and the formula changes they make.
customer_reviews.author: niecie1

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this stuff. It even has little pieces of meat that are in it to make it more appealing than just plain old dry food. Cant go wrong with this an you have more than one option to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: If dogs could talk they would say give me more
customer_reviews.text: Can't keep their bowls fool. They love this stuff so much. They eat it go play and come back and eat some more. Very happy with this food for our fuzzy head friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dasia Stigger

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our Vet
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dog's Sampson and Charlie love Purina Pro Plan Savor. Their Vet recommended that I feed them it cuz Sampson needed to gain weight and Charlie needed to lose weight. I bought 3 40 lb. bags for them on Subscribe and Save. So far, they've tried the chicken and rice & the beef and rice and they both love it! I also bought the Purina Pro Plan Savor Salmon, but they haven't tried that yet but I'm sure that they'll love it too. After they try the Salmon, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Great food for your dog!
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this food from Blue Buffalo after that article about the dog food came out, my husky shepherd LOVES this food! He can’t get enough of it. This gets 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: Annelyse Drakeley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this. I have recently changed from the Pro Plan chicken and rice which they also love, but my dachshunds are getting older so I thought I would give it a try. They love it just as much.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak to the taste of the food but it’s the only thing my dog will eat so I’ll have to say it tastes good. I want to compliment this seller on their great customer service. My original shipment may have arrived but it may have been stolen or possibly delivered to the wrong residence. Regardless, when I contacted the seller they were kind enough to reship me another bag at no additional charge. They certainly didn’t have to do that but I’m very grateful they did. A+ on customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it !
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff. We switched from a more commercial variety of dog food to this when we ran out one day and had to take what we could get at a gourmet dog food store. To our surprise the dogs absolutely loved this food. I paid the same price for half the food locally. The price is right and its delivered to my door monthly with the auto-reorder option !
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good dry food choice
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like this. It's hard to make sense of all the information about dry dog food these days, but this one appears to have a good ingredient list. It's not the cheapest, but not the most expensive either. I think it's a good choice for a good all-around dry dog food.
customer_reviews.author: mediawench

customer_reviews.title: All Breeds??
customer_reviews.text: We have a toy poodle where we have been using only Purina food for small breeds since 2007. Loved that product where we changed to "ALL BREEDS" version of Purina Pro Plan "Adult Plan" however the bites are almost twice the size where the dog will now not eat it. This is a problem where unless that have a smaller bites product we'll have to find another product.
customer_reviews.author: Tsunami Jive

customer_reviews.title: Our lab loves it
customer_reviews.text: ProPlan came highly recommended from vets and pet owners, and they’re right. This is a favorite of my dog, and has been our normal food for about 7 years now. Occasionally we try something new, and before the bag is gone our dog is already over it. He’s never turned his nose up at ProPlan Savor though.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen Ellis

customer_reviews.title: High quality, good taste
customer_reviews.text: My vet highly recommended Purina Pro Plan for my 70 pound AmStaff mix. I had been feeding him a grain free diet, and my vet suggested switching to this food until further research is conducted on grain free foods for dogs. My dog loves the salmon flavor, and as a picky eater that is high praise. He seems to have more energy than his previous dog food, and the salmon helps his coat stay healthy. I have and continue to suggest Purina Pro Plan to friends looking to change their dog's food.
customer_reviews.author: Will Fullton

customer_reviews.title: Pro plan Savor Lamb and Rice saves the day.
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd dog is a very picky eater and I had her on blue wilderness Duck and she loved it but I keep hearing about how grain-free dog food isn’t good now for like the heart so I tried her on 3 different Purina pro plan and she picked the savor shredded blend Lamb and Rice with probiotics and she has never eaten is good as she is now. So I’m very pleased so fa. She seems to love lamb.Protein needs to be higher I prefer at least 34 percent at the least.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Kind

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food
customer_reviews.text: We've had great results with this dog food. Feeding an Irish wolf hound (couch potato) and a border collie cross (high energy, high drive). They both keep appropriate body condition and healthy coats, once we adjusted to correct amounts for their needs. We have tried several different dog foods, including some of the expensive designer brands, but have had the best luck with both dogs eating well and doing well with proplan.
customer_reviews.author: Breahna M Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great for Medium to Large Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My pitbull mix and boxer love this dog food. I recently switched them over to this to try something new and they have been eating it for about a month. They never refuse it and are always eager to eat. The pieces are a combination of hard pieces mixed with some softer pieces of meat. We have yet to experience any allergic reactions. Smells delicious too!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: They all love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few dry foods that all 9 of my rescue dogs love. They eat it dry, mixed with wet and dry with a bit of broth or water to soften it up for the very old ones with limited chewing ability. It keeps their tummies settled and coats shiny.
customer_reviews.author: JoeJustJoe

customer_reviews.title: The best for our beagle
customer_reviews.text: We started him off on this brand as a pup. It is expensive so we tried some other things. After noticeable changes in our dog, we decided to go back to this brand. He loves it and is so much happier and feels better. Not all dog foods are created equal! He is turning 10yo this month.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality food for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the food and it is Filled with so many good nutrients for them. Their coats are already so better and it is gentle to their stomachs which my puppy has a sensitive stomach. This size bag is a great price and lasts a long time for two dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Jill A. Limberg

customer_reviews.title: Improved energy
customer_reviews.text: Amazon, not sure how I'm supposed to rate the flavor, my dog eats it not me? This food drastically improved my dogs energy from nutro simply brand. He is 5yrs old and I walk him 3 miles a day and he still runs circles around the kids.
customer_reviews.author: The Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think it’s bad? Maybe not good tasting.
customer_reviews.text: Neither of my dogs care for it One of them dislikes so much he eats grass and then throws up the grass. Doesn’t seem to be a bad food but nether of my boys care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: When I switched my dog over to Purina Pro Plan, I saw immediate results. Thank You Purina
customer_reviews.text: When I switched my dog over to Purina Pro Plan, I saw immediate results. Her stomach sensitivity is a thing of the past! Thank you Purina! Purina Pro Plan has worked wonders for my dog's sensitive stomach. My pup grew up on Diamond Naturals puppy food. In adulthood, I tried several different variants of Diamond Naturals, taking great care to progressively wean her between chicken, lamb, and beef, trying each one for about months to give her stomach a chance to adjust. She always had soft stool, and often would struggle with diarrhea. I wish I would have tried Purina Pro Plan sooner, because it is perfect for my dog. No more stomach issues!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for my labradoodle
customer_reviews.text: My dog never seem to be ok with this food even after having been on it for months. She has had a very bad diarrhea coupe weeks ago only being on this food and I had to pay more than 500$ for pet visit and treatment. She would have yellowish liquid vomit occasionally being on this food. Sadly I can’t return this food due to return window being closed. I bought a better food.
customer_reviews.author: Tuga

customer_reviews.title: Someone tampered with the box!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but this delivery the box was completely opened, you can tell the tape was sliced open. The box was not damaged, but someone opened it. I am going to toss the whole bag of dog food. With this current health crisis we are under, I do not trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Martella

customer_reviews.title: Quality food, Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Quality food. My two Siberian Huskies love it. Sandee and Zoe are 13 and 11 years old. They have done very well on this food. They like the Shredded bits. Price here is comparable to PetSmart. I use Subscribe and Save and it saves me 15% and a special trip to the pet store. Also, I don't have to lift the heavy bags. Yeah, amazon prime!
customer_reviews.author: K. Troendle

customer_reviews.title: Delivery issues but great product .
customer_reviews.text: Love the product a lot less gas on my babies bellies. Which is great for us being one baby weighs 165 lbs. and the other 110. Product was to be delivered by Usps which normally it comes ups. According to Amazon they chose Usps to get our order to us quicker. Well post office never attempted delivery just left note it was to big and wouldn’t fit in mailbox. So needless to say after asking for redelivery I still had to go pick it up. Was a bit upset but my babies love the food.
customer_reviews.author: margret gibson

customer_reviews.title: Quite Happy with this Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Vets Generally recommend providing a variety of food to your dogs which is hard for me because BOTH have sensitive stomachs so I can't safely change the food much. This food is one of three I have found I can feed them without issues. Great price for the amount too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: happy dog
customer_reviews.text: Tried an assortment of various foods for my larger, very active but older friend with a sensitive stomach and this one appears to be the best. Since he's been eating this we have no issues with him not eating or wanting to eat and no issues with his digestive track. So far great.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the soft pieces! He has eaten the food for years and has a beautiful coat and is always complimented on his health at the vet. We usually buy this dog food at the local pet store for the exact same price. We realized we could have it shipped, so it saves us the trip and heavy carrying! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GZ

customer_reviews.title: Dogs became extremely ill.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what happened but the day after my dogs ate this product they both became extremely ill. Diarrhea and throwing up and now they won’t eat. I have purchased this product before and didn’t have an issue so All I can think is that there is something wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: good food
customer_reviews.text: I switched my dogs over to purina pro plan after my old lady dog developed skin problems. I made a lot of changes in their whole lifestyle to get her skin to clear up. I can't be sure what worked, but I am staying with this dog food since the girls have gotten used to it, they like it and it is better for them.
customer_reviews.author: Garnet Coulthard

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy online
customer_reviews.text: this last bag made my dog sick !!! won’t be ordering again on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Higgins Crew Master

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food, been buying for years for my two dogs. They are very healthy. They won't eat different brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L. Belveal

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: We recently switched from Science Diet to pro plan. I like the fact that my dog eats less of this compared to science diet. He would mow down a 35 lb $60 bag of science diet in weeks. He is thinner now but healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cubberly

customer_reviews.title: 'Shredded blend' means kibble and pieces that look like shredded meat
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not knowing what shredded blend meant. The food was fine and my dog liked it, but he likes the 'shredded' bit enough more that he digs them out to eat first. Leaving a crumbs and kibble scattered everywhere. Which he, mostly, eats after the good stuff is gone, but clean-up isn't really his strong suit. So lots of sweeping up crumbs and bits around the bowl this month. Will be sticking with Pro Plan, but not this formula.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs & IceCream

customer_reviews.title: Good quality; Trusted brand.
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this food and we trust Purina. We mix this formula and the Focus Salmon formula. The Focus ingredients are better, but our dogs go crazy for the shredded bits in this blend. We comprise and mix the two.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: On Subscription At Our Place. Dogs Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs actually crave this. It must be delicious and no problems with digestion etc. they have energy and their coats are glistening. Great for our dogs of a few sizes and ages. It’s on subscription at our place.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA L. BANDUCCI

customer_reviews.title: Veterinarian Recco
customer_reviews.text: My veterinary clinic recommends this food. My dog is extremely picky and took to this food right away. I didn't have to starve him or entice him to eat it. I had previously tried a couple of major, good quality brands and the dog only ate them when he finally got hungry enough. He likes this food and ate it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Alien

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it and is thriving...
customer_reviews.text: Dog likes it and is thriving... BUT I worry that it is from farmed salmon which has nasty chemicals and bad sanitation. I emailed Purina about if they had any organic dog food coming and got a buncha BS in reply..
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT F WASSERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. I actually feed them less on this food than the Purina pro plan 30/20 food. For some reason this fills them up better. The dogs absolutely love it. I do wish all the pieces were the hard pieces as the soft pieces tend to create crumbs when they get crushed in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Better at petco
customer_reviews.text: Good price, but better deal and better grain at petco. This food has chunks but the petco food has the pebbles which is better for digestion. They also offer autodelivery. I do find it odd that the consistency is different, even though the brand is the same
customer_reviews.author: K. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch Received
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this dog food for almost a year. I recently purchased 3 bags. Something was different with two of the bags. There were no chunks, only very dry, almost powdery bits mixed in with the crunchy pieces. Very disappointing. I may have to buy locally if this continues.
customer_reviews.author: jkags

customer_reviews.title: Great Switch for my Golden with Allergies
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Purina Pro Plan's large breed adult food to this as my golden developed allergies which we determined were poultry related. He has loved this food, maintained a healthy weight, has a shiny coat, and has done terrific on it so far given his sometimes-sensitive stomach. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Slocum

customer_reviews.title: Crumbs
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product and the dogs love it, but the bag I received all the soft pieces were reduced to crumbs. So when I feed the dogs, it is just the hard bits with crumbs of the soft bits. It's not that big of deals as the dogs still eat it but it's a little troublesome as to what the bag has been through or how long it has been on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky eaters!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is the pickiest eater ever. I tried many different dog foods before my vet recommended this and I am so glad she did. My dog LOVES this food. In the past I would have to sit with my dog on the floor and encourage her to eat and I would have to add scrambled eggs to entice her, but now she enthusiastically pushes her bowl around when it is close to her dinner time.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna North

customer_reviews.title: Chewy. Not crunchy
customer_reviews.text: So the pups don’t really like It. I come Home to full bowls pretty often. I was Eating pizza one night while getting drunk and thought a piece of sausage dropped...I picked It up and ate It and realized It was the dog food. It was chewy and very bland. Maybe the dogs just prefer crunchy food? Who knows. I’ll have to mix in another brand so this huge bag doesn’t go to waste
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Eluz

customer_reviews.title: Formula changed
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranian has been eating this blend for years. She loves it but something has changed with my last bag of food. The small kibbles are fine but she can not chew & break up the larger blend pieces. She removes them & places them to the side. I picked a couple up & I could not break or tear them apart. They were more like rawhide pieces. Never had anything like this before. Unfortunately this will be my last bag to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: richard n. gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog was getting sensitivity to every food we tried and this one was suggested by our vet. We gave it a go and our dog loves it, has no digestion problems now and actually eats all of his food. On his old food he use to have Diarrhea and only eat a little bit every couple days, he is so much happier now and his stomach is much less bloated.
customer_reviews.author: Halfdozen

customer_reviews.title: Pro Plan/Amazon, Who could ask for a better team!
customer_reviews.text: Our rescue Saint Bernard has flourished on Pro Plans well balanced high quality, and Amazon has delivered on time, every time rite to my garage door, no driving to the pet store, finding a cart, hauling it around, etc. She was 56lbs when we rescued her. She just had a wellness visit with the vet and is now 103lbs of muscle and healthy as a horse!
customer_reviews.author: Sally/Tom

customer_reviews.title: Gave my dog terrible diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the food but the probiotics on it gave him terrible tore up stomach. I switched him to the Purina ONE that can be purchased at walmart and he loves it just as much as this food and stools are normal as well.
customer_reviews.author: DEE snuts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality-Good price
customer_reviews.text: Have had my dog on this for years. Consistently good, he's in fine health and his weight has remained constant feeding him this product as recommended. Amazon has recently beaten the box pet stores pricewise.
customer_reviews.author: James N. De Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from my dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food, and it is good for them. Pricing is best on Amazon. The only bad thing is that I bought the 47 pound bag, and USPS just dumped it in my driveway rather than bringing it to my porch. Doesn't Amazon pay more for larger packages to be delivered. Seems like carrying it to the porch would be included.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly

customer_reviews.title: Smashed But Tasty
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this bag of dog food has been sooooo crumbly and messy. I usually buy this same brand/flavor for my dog at the local pet shop and it's never been so crumbly before. Not sure if I will try again given how messy my pup's meal time has become.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Our huskys favorite dog food.
customer_reviews.text: Our husky loves this food. Hes super picky but after some time of trying diff products, we finally found another dry food product that he likes. Theres small semi meaty pieces in it. Great find.
customer_reviews.author: NYPjs11

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater active dog approved
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs is picky and has super high energy/metabolism. He will eat this so has managed to look healthier with appropriate weight on his sporting dog frame and a bloom and health in his coat. He is excited to eat now where he used to hide from the food bowl or just look at it with disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: PGld

customer_reviews.title: He seems to like it, but of course he would rather have ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is fed only Purina Pro Plan dry food, and he's healthy. He seems to like it, but of course he would rather have a steak. I asked him if he likes it, but he doesn't speak English. I tried this dog food myself, and didn't like it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: DEFUND SCUMBAG AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: Its garbage, would you buy anything from a scumbag company that hates cops?????
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: When I adopted my older dog he would not eat. I tried several different foods and this is this only one that he will eat consistently. So when we recently adopted a friend for him we started her on ProPlan immediately.
customer_reviews.author: smakahi

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Refused It Sadly
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my dog did not like the taste at all and refused to eat it. I even combined with an expensive wet food and she licked the wet food off each piece, leaving the dry pieces in her bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

product_meta.title: Purina Pro Plan With Probiotics Shredded Blend High Protein, Digestive Health Adult Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Lamb & Rice| Size:35 lb. BagHelp your dog achieve his own level of greatness with Purina Pro Plan SAVOR Shredded Blend Lamb & Rice Formula dry adult dog. Real lamb is the #1 ingredient in this high protein dog food formula, and the super premium kibble doesn't compromise on nutrition or flavor. Optimal levels of protein and fat help your dog maintain an ideal body condition throughout his adult life. The vitamin A and linoleic acid, an omega 6 fatty acid, in this dry dog food help promote healthy skin and a shiny coat. Purina Pro Plan SAVOR works to support your dog's digestive and immune health with guaranteed live probiotics in every serving. Natural prebiotic fiber, sourced from wheat bran, supports the beneficial bacteria in his digestive tract. Watch as your dog enjoys the dual textured experience of hard kibble and tender shredded pieces that provide a unique contrast dogs love. Purina Pro Plan SAVOR gives him the 100 percent complete and balanced nutrition for adult dogs he needs to feel his best every day. Calorie Content (fed)(ME): 4064 kcal/kg, 389 kcal/cup.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
On the journey towards greatness, your dog deserves to have it all. Purina(R) Pro Plan(R) is dedicated to helping owners and their dogs realize their potential through high-quality, great-tasting nutrition--giving dogs the chance to be, and feel, exceptional.
feature_bullets: One (1) 35 pounds Bag Purina Pro Plan With Probiotics Dry Dog Food, SAVOR Shredded Blend Lamb & Rice Formula
Made with high quality protein, including real lamb as the primary ingredient
Fortified with guaranteed live probiotics to support digestive and immune health
Contains rice, an excellent source of carbohydrates for energy
Ingredients are carefully selected to provide key nutrients pets need

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
